oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some Fundamental Theorems of Functional Analysis with Bicomplex and Hyperbolic Scalars
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Saini, Heera
Kumar, Romesh
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Functional Analysis
30G35, 46A22, 46A30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We discuss some properties of linear functionals on topological hyperbolic and topological bicomplex modules. The hyperbolic and bicomplex analogues of the uniform boundedness principle, the open mapping theorem, the closed graph theorem and the Hahn Banach separation theorem are proved.
